Package main.java.model

Class DataIOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.DataIOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataIO
    public class DataIOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataIO
    This class represents an implementation of the DataIO Interface. Majority of the methods deals with doing input/output of data from static Json/CSV files.
